name: PADDLE-WARZ
description:
Paddle Warz is a version of ping-pong game which requires some skills and a determination to win the game by Hook or Crook. You can use power-ups and create situations that can help you win. Freeze, Stun or Blow up opponents paddle. Disorient, confuse or just irritate them to Win the Battle. Just as the saying "All's Fair in Love and War".

All the assets, code and audio files were created during the Jam with the exception of Font which was provided in the Engine.

Multiplayer  : 2 to 4 players

Team:

Sandeep K Pilakanawal - Game Developer
Vikas Sharma - Game Art & Level Design
Aditya Muley - Game Developer & Audio Artist
